deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: Miner

deck.description: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.

deck.name: Valkyrie
deck.description: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.

deck.description: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!

deck.name: Electro Wizard
deck.description: He lands with a "POW!", stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.

deck.name: Arrows
deck.description: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.

deck.name: Zappies
deck.description: Spawns a pack of miniature Zap machines. Who controls them...? Only the Master Builder knows.

deck.name: Poison
deck.description: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure!

deck.name: Graveyard
deck.description: Surprise! It's a party. A Skeleton party, anywhere in the Arena. Yay!

deck.name: Barbarian Hut
deck.description: Building that periodically spawns Barbarians to fight the enemy. Time to make the Barbarians!

deck.name: Ice Golem
deck.description: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.
